website_summaries.verdict: This award-winning mattress is great for all sleepers and has an unbeatable price for the quality you receive.
pros: Multi-layered memory foam makes for a comfortable sleep, no matter what position you sleep in
Easy installation and great customer service
cons: If you're used to more traditional mattresses with springs and other bells and whistles, this might not be the one for you

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my FIL to replace his that flooded in Harvey. He just was able to move back into his house last week and after 2 days of airing out he slept on it and the mattress caved. So, he turned it over and it caved again the next night. He turned it back over and slept on the opposite side and it caved too. So, he has 3 large depressions and has to buy a new mattress. Now I'm out my money because it's outside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent to start, ruined after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much ruined after only 6 months of being in our guestroom. We have guests sleep on it maybe 5 times per month since we bought it, and the two people that sleep on it are under 170 pounds. There are two massive "dents" where they sleep and it's incredibly uncomfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Mattress width reduced to half its original size in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after careful consideration and settled for its good relatively firm + soft combination. In first month itself i could notice it bending from the centre, I'm 120 pounds in weight. Its been 6 months now and it has completely deformed by bending in centre and sideways too. This is unacceptable for a 120$ worth of mattress! I DO NOT RECOMMEND this mattress at all!
customer_reviews.author: simral

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product in April and within 6 months the mattress is completely sagging and no longer usable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ravsh

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these twin mattresses for our children's beds. We do like the overall. They are comfortable and the price was nice. That said, the sizing is quite inconsistent. One of the mattresses is 3 inches shorter than the other, and doesn't fill the bed as it should. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: skc85

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every penny BUT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who has a 100% memory foam bed. He loves it over memory foam. The bed is the perfect mix of firmness and softness, I like that is a hybrid bed with coils and memory foam. However, this never inflated to 10 inches since Dec 18th and is only 8 inches - I need resolution as this is not what is advertised as
customer_reviews.author: Alex.S

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical fumes still persist, four months after purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Strong chemical fumes have persisted for months. I am going to throw out the mattress. I am concerned about possible health effects on my four-year-old. When we open her bedroom door in the morning the fumes are overwhelming, although we've had the mattress for four months. CertiPur certification claiming that the mattress is low in toxic emissions may be a sham. According to an article on the myessentia website, chemical companies created this certification to make the memory foam appear safe. I believe that to be true based on my experience with this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J.

customer_reviews.title: When this bed is delivered it is rolled up. ...
customer_reviews.text: When this bed is delivered it is rolled up. here it is 2 years later and when you lay on the bed, it is still not flat. when you lay on it on your back, you can feel your stomach pushed up to the ceiling. Again, it's been 2 years of laying this bed flat and it's still curved. This was purchased for my 3 year old at that time...now 5 and I guess she's just not heavy enough to put a dent in it
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It's not flat anymore
customer_reviews.text: We must have received a defective one. After 2 years, we have just noticed that it has warped into kind of an "M" shape. It's slept on by a preschooler, so it isn't a case of being too heavy. UPDATE: As I was replacing the mattress, I realized that my in-laws installed the box spring upside down 2 years ago. Instead of having support throughout, the mattress was only getting support on the bottom on the edges and one beam in the middle. Thus, the sagging in-between the edges and the very middle. Changing from 1 star to 5 as it isn't the mattress's fault.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - In less than one month its unbearable!
customer_reviews.text: Followed all the instructions on letting the bed inflate for 48 hours. After only 2 weeks of sleeping on this it looks like something you'd see on the side of the road for trash pickup. A 2" sag on each side where we sleep and the Appalachian Trail down the middle. We read some positive reviews, I don't know who wrote these, but I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this mattress and set it up the first week ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress and set it up the first week of August. I didn't purchase thinking it would be a long term mattress but wanted to move from a Queen to a King. While the price point is low, I thought expecting a couple of years of wear was acceptable. Unfortunately, 3 months later the springs are failing, and my wife and I are sleeping in a valley where the mattress has sunk on both sides. I have already flipped it and it has repeated the same problem on the other side. I am 6'0 200lbs and my wife is 5'7" 120. Pay the extra money and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hiens

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful mattress for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased six of these mattresses. We purchased a queen, two full, and three twins. So far, we are incredibly impressed with the quality of these mattresses! They were able to be slept on comfortably within an hour or so of opening them. 😊 I would absolutely recommend purchasing these mattresses. And no, we were not paid nor did we receive anything for this review. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: HomeschoolMamaofFour

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace in 14 months and warranty doesn't cover 3" sagging
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these September 2015 for my daughter's. While on the floor, the mattress is quite comfortable. When they were put on the signature sleep metal box spring, they were extremely hard. Can't figure that one out. When the box springs started sagging(3"), the mattress obviously did too. I replaced the box spring with wood slats in November 2016, and that made it a little more comfortable, but not much. Unfortunately, the 3" sagging to the mattress was not fixed by the slats, and they both had to be replaced. Of course it's not covered by warranty either and there's $320 down the drain for a little over a year of use. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: NSCali

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought this mattress, my siblings both have one, and my parents have ordered at least 3. The convenience of having a mattress delivered right to you door (for FREE!) is rivaled only by how comfortable this mattress is. My boyfriends 70 year old aunt slept on our 4 year old mattress and said it was the first night she didn't have any back pain in years (this mattress is literally 4 years old!). There isn't a better deal on a mattress anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: krickarby

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is awesome, this bed is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m very disappointed with this bed. We let it inflate for over 48 hours and from the first night the perimeter / edge sections are very flimsy. If you get near the edge at all you feel like you’re going to roll out of the bed. If you sit on the edge of the bed you basically sink all the way down. I thought this had “special edge support”?! The middle of the bed feels decent but the overall workmanship and quality of the bed leaves something to be desired. Save your money and invest in a nicer, higher quality bed. I will say that amazon’s customer service was beyond excellent and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Keep in mind that this isn't a $5k product
customer_reviews.text: Keeping in mind that this is a bed in a box and not a part of a $5000 mattress set I say that this is an excellent choice. I bought 2 for my adult boys who weigh less than 130lbs. They have no difficulties or problems. Sleeping is excellent. The mattresses expanded as expected and while I wasn't picky about the exact final measurements I noted that they were close enough to the expectation. Edges are not as well supported as the high scale expensive mattress but it's not like they spend a lot of time sitting on the edge. For my budget it was a perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: WyldMom

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum Packed With A Steamroller!
customer_reviews.text: My old mattress was 10+ years old...my only reason for replacement. This one came in a box all rolled up but once the bag was opened, it expanded quickly. My old mattress had added side support...when you sat on the edge, it didn't collapse. This one has no side support whatsoever, but it sleeps well as long as you stay in the center. Another plus, besides the price, is that it can be turned over...my old one was not and could only be turned end for end. Probably would make a good child's first bed if it's close to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Short fit in bed-frame. Doesn't compare to previous one owed.
customer_reviews.text: This was our second time purchasing this brand. My daughter's mattress is 9 years old and going strong. A good size twin. We ordered this one for my son and it is too short on his bed frame... Disappointing and not sure where to go from here. I can't return. It functions for sleeping but creates a huge gap at the end of his bed frame. I'd ask for a partial refund but I don't even know if the company would care.
customer_reviews.author: JLEWIS-LEX

customer_reviews.title: A very decent, inexpensive bed!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a good option! It's quite comfortable. Being cost effective, it's not a high end mattress, but for someone in need of a decently made bed, this one is very good. We don't get hot with this, and it doesn't have any foreign odors that either of us noticed. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: No help at all
customer_reviews.text: Not even a whole year and exactly half of the mattress feels like I’m sleeping on 2 different beds one is the way it supposed to be and the other I can feel the whole exactly whole other half of the bed sinking like I can feel the coils, called the company DHP that supplies Amazon with the mattress a man by the name of Mike was very unhelpful and arrogant never again will I buy something of this magnitude on amazon certain things just can’t be rolled up and mailed
customer_reviews.author: jimmy davenport

customer_reviews.title: I'll say that this mattress is extremely comfortable and has held up well so far
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year of use, I'll say that this mattress is extremely comfortable and has held up well so far. I purchased the 8" queen mattress. I'm a stomach and side sleeper, so I prefer something less rigid. Compared to a $1000 Sealy posturepedic mattress I purchased before (which hurt my back and neck after a month of use), this mattress has exceeded expectations and give me quality sleep and comfort. I'm also grateful for the branding consistently (something that's otherwise a nightmare with mattresses). I will definitely buy this again, if I ever need a mattress in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sam J.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: The item's title description stated the 12"mattress is reversible. It is not. I got mixed info from other reviews too.. some said it is a very firm, reversible mattress (which is what I wanted), others said it is a soft mattress. I received a non-flippable, one-sided pillow top mattress. The mattress did open to its full thickness without lumps or sags. The edges seem to hold shape when bed is sat upon. Not sure if this model was accidentally shipped to me or if there is an error in the mattress description from where I ordered. Either way, I'm stuck with it. 4 stars if you want a soft yet supportive, non-reversible, pillow top mattress.
customer_reviews.author: JDSW

customer_reviews.title: ... year of owning this mattress - it is very comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: This review is after almost a year of owning this mattress - it is very comfortable and supportive. Unlike pillow tops, the mattress can be flipped and rotated without any issues, which is a definite perk to making it last. I have an additional topper on top of it to care for it, but even alone, it is very comfortable. It arrives rolled up in a cloth bag with a shoulder strap - it is very heavy, but can be moved by one person (I managed to move it up a set of stairs by myself). Unwrap it and let it air out for a day before sleeping on it, to get rid of the plastic smell. 10/10 can recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Much more firm than I expected
customer_reviews.text: 8 Inch Hybrid Reversible Mattress, Queen size. From reading all the reviews I thought this mattress would be softer than it is. It is actually quite firm. Provides good support and was a great price compared to most mattresses. However, if you like a softer mattress, this is probably not the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Musical Mama

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: I give this mattress 2 stars...it seems well made and there is nothing wrong with it. I didn't notice the chemical smells othes mentioned. I let is lay fully open for 2 full days before using. But, after one night sleeping on it my lower back is very sore. Not sure why. I normally use a firm support mattress, perhaps this just doesn't have the right support for me.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Stevens

customer_reviews.title: For college kids and guest rooms alike!
customer_reviews.text: 4... and half stars! I bought this mattress for my sophomore at college along with a metal platform frame. She claimed she loved it, I felt it was comfy enough that first. The big test was mom's weekend, where I spent two nights (and two naps!) and felt it was ALMOST as good as my $1200 pillow top mattress. Buying one for my mom's guest room (where I stay a lot) and referred this to my sister for her bedroom as well. Half star off is for a bit of the struggle to wrestle it out of the box. Favorite buy 0f 2016!!
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Super uncomfortable and thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought my kids this brand. 8 inch as well, Twin and full. They have been using it for years with no issues so I decided to buy a queen size for me. I regret it every day! It's super uncomfortable and thinner than advertised! I left it days without using to see if it the matress would rise to the 8 inch but it stayed in 6 inches. You also feel the springs of the matress and if you sit just a little to close to the edge it bends completely! What a waste of money. Now in stuck with this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these: two twins for my kids' rooms and one king for my room. We've been sleeping on them for over two years and they're still comfy. I like a little firmness to my mattresses due to scoliosis and these are firm yet not too firm. You don't have much to lose with the low cost and convenience. No cost of delivery and no dealing with shmarmy mattress sales people. Be warned that the boxes are heavy, and especially for the king, it was tough to get the box up the stairs alone but I did it. Family has visited from out of town and slept on these and then went home and purchased their own.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Okay people it's officially the future now. Beds come in managable size boxes from the internet. I have been using this bed for months now and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: xjohnnydarkox

customer_reviews.title: Cool Support
customer_reviews.text: I FINALLY wake up in the morning without a backache! And no sweat. Elated about this purchase. Inner springs with foam topping. Previously had been sleeping on memory foam. I am not a fan. It trapped my body heat and made me feel way too immovable during the night. The innersprings breathe-so I can!! I love that this is a double sided mattress. Meaning it can be rotated and flipped for even wear. (Like rotating tires)
customer_reviews.author: KDuranBoy

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is one of the best items I have ever purchased from Amazon. The comfort provided by this mattressis unlike any other I have seen. Its already 4 months still feels as if its new.For starters, getting out of bed in the morning may become increasingly difficult and there is a high risk of dependency on the comforting effects this mattress provides. Side effects from use of this mattress include sleepiness, comfort, lack of motivation to start and or/conclude your day, short term comatose lasting up to 8 hours, and episodes of missing time. Should you find yourself unable to part from your bed, find solace in knowing that aren't the only one and that you have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Mahesh Balasubramaniam

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: This is new version of product, very bad!
customer_reviews.text: They changed the design this is a new version. A very bad version. We bought one of these previously and loved it, it is awesome. This new mattress resembles it in exterior looks but it is junk. It is a horrible stiff uncomfortable sheet of plywood compared to the Oregon all version that gave it such a stellar rating. But this new mattress is not the mattress that is being advertised and sold here. This is now pure garbage. They are using previous info from the previous version of this mattress to get you to buy it. RUNAWAY!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: While it is a comfortable mattress, it is not 12" - which is the size I ordered. The box label stated 12", the receipt was for a 12" mattress, but it is 10". The mattress sat for two days to expand. I used a wooden board on top with a level to measure this, to give the manufacturer the benefit of loft in the center. Not a way this is 12". I could return this, but how's that even possible after expansion. Why it makes a difference is bedside table height. You'd be amazed at the inconvenience of the loss of two inches. So tell me, manufacturer, how do you make this right?
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Bed is hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: There was never any description on bed firmness. We received the bed on Thursday, January 3rd. We took the bed out of the packaging and read the directions saying bed needed 72 hours to expand. It is Sunday, January 6th and the bed is still hard as a rock. Very disappointed. I have bought Signature Sleep Mattress before and was always happy with their product but after this bed I can honestly say I do not know if I will ever buy another bed from them again. My 5 year old daughter is very unhappy and wants her toddler bed back because it is not hard. I would rate this bed with no stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best you're gonna get at this price
customer_reviews.text: If you want a good mattress that can be shipped right to your door and doesn't cost a fortune, this is the one. It's a little on the firm side, I think, but I'm not picky about that (so take it with a chunk of salt). Definitely comfortable and the reversibility means it should last well too (TBD).
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 6 inches too short! bad buy!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is only 68 inches long, a whopping 6 inches shorter than your average twin size mattress. And it's 4 inches shorter than advertised. If I could send it back I would. I have to stuff a queen sized blanket the end I'd the bed frame to keep my kid from falling through the giant gap!
customer_reviews.author: KitCatPattyWhack

customer_reviews.title: Great for 5 years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now had this mattress for 5 years and the springs on one side are finally starting to slump a little. It could be because I spend quite a lot of time sitting on the edge of the bed on that side. And I’m a heavy guy. So with that said, I’d say this mattress has been one of the best purchases of the past 5 years for me. Even today, it’s still incredibly comfortable. I’m only writing this review because I’m thinking about moving up to the queen size from the double and thought people might like to know how the double has held up. It’s seriously a great, great mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering this mattress...I read a lot...A LOT of reviews of different mattresses. What made me decide on this one was the two sided option. When it arrived...I opened it and let it stay in the spare bedroom for a few days while it came to shape. It was 8in as described. We have had this for a few weeks now and I have slept on it a few times with my daughter. It is firm but very comforable. Definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yan G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for short term mattress
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress since October of 2014. At first, it was amazing! Very comfortable. After 8 months or so I noticed I wasn't sleeping quite as well on it and I just decided to upgrade tonight. For the price (I paid just under $200) at the time, I can't really complain. I was on a tight budget and it served me well for nearly 2 years. Short term it's a good purchase, but if you're looking for long lasting, save up a bit and get a higher quality mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley & Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Going 5 years strong!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a full size little more than five years ago for my then 13-year old, along with the Dream DNA gel infused memory foam mattress topper 2". I didn't make much money at the time and the goal was to upgrade once I could afford to. However, it is such a comfortable bed that there's been no need to change a thing. I must admit that he's never slept with on it without the mattress topper. But there have been no issues whatsoever. With the mattress topper, it's a soft, but not too soft, mattress experience. I also purchased the Linenspa down alternative quilted comforter, what was another inexpensive and great investment! His bed soooo comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Bigeye

customer_reviews.title: Pass.  Lumpy and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Slept on this mattress for four months. Horrible, horrible experience. The thing is lumpy and uncomfortable. Perhaps it was because I had it right on the ground and not on a box spring? I don't know. But my experience was that this thing sucks. I'm not at all opposed to mail-order mattresses either. I have one at home that is great! My favorite. But this? Yuck. I'm going to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Jabba D. Hut

customer_reviews.title: Can feel the coils. Cannot sleep on it
customer_reviews.text: This review is for Queen 8 inch. It looks very wrinkled after expansion and we can feel coils on sleeping on it. Very uncomfortable. We earlier had the twin size of this bed. That was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gupta

customer_reviews.title: For the price the bed is amazing. It is definitely on the firm side and ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price the bed is amazing. It is definitely on the firm side and I've been looking into some mattress toppers to see if I could find something to remedy that a bit. A lot of times I like to sleep on my side and this mattress seems too firm for side sleeping without a topper. It creates pressure points that are uncomfortable after a while of side laying. It's pretty neat to take it out of a box that seems way too small to fit a mattress and see it expand.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hunley

customer_reviews.title: Worst mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been quarantined in our guestroom for weeks now. When previous guests told me how uncomfortable this bed was, I should have listened. This is by fat the most uncomfortable mattress I have ever tried to sleep on. Its crunchy. It's hard. You feel every spring and every seam. I ended up putting a 3 inch foam pad on it just to make it bearable and now I have to jump to get into my bed..I hate it. Worst mattress ever. I never should have listened to Jonah!
customer_reviews.author: Movieluver

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Neatly Rolled Up
customer_reviews.text: I got this mattress after ready a review from a trusted product tester/blogger I follow, Mary Hunt. I moved to an apartment and was able to get the mattress shipped in time to load onto my Uhaul. It comes compressed down, rolled, and vacuum sealed. It was amazing to watch it unroll once you break that seal! It's super comfortable and firm which I needed for my back issues. The was a no-brainer purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mcmurry Morris

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this mattress as a guest mattress- as in its only been used maybe 30 nights in 2 years - and it has totally failed. There are noticeable divots in the mattress, the sides have failed, and overall this has been a huge waste of money. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: WV Deb

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son who is 13 and 5'9", weighing 165 pounds (maybe even more!?). We have had it 6 months. He says it is very comfortable, it isn't bowing or sagging and we have had no concerns at all. This is a great buy. We do flip it over once a month and spin it every other to keep the wear uniform. It is a great investment especially as a teen bed, or guest bed. Wouldn't hesitate to get another one and recommend it to anyone I talk to looking for a bed.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed sleeping on it with my 3yr old daughter
customer_reviews.text: I was thoroughly impressed with this mattress. It came quickly rolled up and compressed in the box. When i took it out of the box and removed the plastic the air rushed in and it decompressed. The mattress is extremely soft yet firm enough to sleep on. The individually wrapped coils transfer minimum motion and is quiet. Enjoyed sleeping on it with my 3yr old daughter. Liked it so much i bought a 2nd one for my 5yr old daughter's bed.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many mattresses.., always end up with back pain. Read reviews and went for this hybrid model. It took 24 hrs to "inflate" fully... very heavy! Made well... we did put an extra 3" memory foam topper on this.. I never want to leave my bed!
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves his big boy bed
customer_reviews.text: We just put the mattress on the floor for our son. He sleeps well on it. We play, jump, rough house, read books and snuggle on the bed with him and it is very comfortable. We had no issues with unboxing or unpleasant odor. He's slept on it about 10 months now and it's still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. D.

customer_reviews.title: and it is great! I put a 2" low density memory foam ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this mattress for about 3 weeks, and it is great! I put a 2" low density memory foam topper on top, and the combo is very comfortable. It unpacked well, and recovered to a uniform shape overnight. I gave it 2 days for the manufactured foam odor to dissipate before I put it to use, and the smell was hardly noticeable a few days later. So far I am very pleased with the mattress. Edit: About 1 year later, the mattress still looks and feels like new. Moreover, this is the most comfortable mattress I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this mattress multiple times for different locations and each time it has expanded perfectly and was comfortable yet firm enough to hold its figure for a healthy back. At times i've tried other companies like Zinus and semi higher up mattresses and i've found that there would be some defect or lack of comfort in those mattresses. I found myself returning those and always coming back to this mattress. Unless your getting a high end mattress this one is perfect if you want a cheap mattress that holds its shape for a while and is firm enough for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: shadowrh

customer_reviews.title: Almost four years and doing pretty good
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for almost 4 years (we got it on April 2015) and it's been pretty good. It hasn't started sagging yet and 2 people (one of them 200lb+) have slept on it every day for 4 years. It's not too soft and not too firm. The only problem we had was trying to move this mattress across state because it's pretty floppy so it's kind of unruly when you try to transport it. It was still light enough for two people to move tho. Overall for less than 200 bucks it's served us well.
customer_reviews.author: san91

customer_reviews.title: Very firm, which is great for SLEEP!
customer_reviews.text: Got this mattress a few months ago and its holding up great. We do rotate it at least once a month. This is a firm mattress which is what we wanted instead of our supper soft mattress. At first it took some getting used to but now me and my wife have improved sleep at night which is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Artyom Kozorezov

customer_reviews.title: ZERO edge support - kids will roll-off in middle of night.
customer_reviews.text: ZERO edge support - ugh. After a year of thinking my son was just the clumsiest child, i realized that I was rolling off his bed while reading him books...and wouldn't you know it, my son (10 years old) keeps rolling off the bed in the middle of the night. And, finally, I realized that it's this mattress. I feel badly that I didn't realize it until now. That said, if this is on a suken platform where you don't need edge support, it's very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Dana

customer_reviews.title: Ok for short use
customer_reviews.text: Have had this mattress about 8 months. I had to buy a $100 topper about 3 months in to even get a good sleep, it's now so broke down the edges all collapse and your head falls off. Good for a dorm maybe or short term use.
customer_reviews.author: George Wainscott

customer_reviews.title: Teenager's back pain
customer_reviews.text: So, I purchased this mattress in March of 2015. It is now March of 2018 and my teenage son has been complaining about back pains whenever he gets up from his night's rest which, as a mom, you never want to happen. This has been going on for months and at first I thought it could've been the fact that he plays sports, but he hasn't played in some time and its still happening. I really hate to rate anything against a product but I figured it might be helpful to somebody.
customer_reviews.author: DreamsAreRealE2

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1 year only
customer_reviews.text: This mattress worked fine at first. I regularly turned it, as I wanted it to keep its shape, but after one year, there's a definite dip in the center. I'm not a huge person--5'5", 145lbs, so why is this dip so obvious? I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The queen is NOT a larger version of the twin.
customer_reviews.text: A couple of years ago I bought the 8 inch twin for my office daybed and absolutely love it. I sleep on it for half the year when I'm working graveyards and am totally comfortable, I'm a 54yr old 230lb man - 5 stars. We bought the queen 8 inch thinking it'd just be a larger version of it, it's NOT. It's extremely firm, hard as a rock firm and not comfortable at all. We'll have to pile a layer or two of foam on top of this to make it usable. If you want a very firm mattress this'd be it. If you want a comfortable mattress this isnt it.
customer_reviews.author: DaveH

customer_reviews.title: it was super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: The first couple days i slept on it, it was super comfy... now a few weeks (almost a month) I'm waking up with back and shoulder pain ... I think it would be good for like a day bed where it's not being used all the time but not an everyday sleep ... I'm 20, 135 pounds ... might be good for kids ... It is pretty to look at
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be afraid to order!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mattress for several months and am very happy with it. It is firm but not like a board. I do not sink in nor do I have any difficulty trying to roll over or get out of bed. I have no mattress related backaches to report! I am 165 pounds, medium height and have some regular mild back and moderate arthritis issues which factor into my review. It is not hard to unpack if you read the directions although it is easier with two people. Glad I took a chance and ordered my first compressed mattress by mail vs. traditional store.
customer_reviews.author: BostonMA62

customer_reviews.title: Baseline of mattresses- doesn’t get any worse than this
customer_reviews.text: We were in a bind and didn’t take the time to completely read through all the reviews and cross check. My fault on that part. Gotta be one of the worse mattresses I’ve ever bought- a couple of nights sleeping in the guest room on this cause we were redoing our room and the back aches are baaaaaaad. We knew it was soft but not so much that my 170 pound frane would basically turn myself into a human taco. Ended up paying almost as much as those 3-4 layer 12” mattresses after getting a topper that firmed it up a little more!
customer_reviews.author: TheSandeman

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the queen size mattress on August 11, 2016, as a friend of mine recommended it and all the great reviews. I liked that it would just come to the door rolled up. It slept well. Couple of months ago while making the bed I discovered a dip where my hips are, I am 5.10 and weigh 170 pds Rotated THE mattress and within no time there is a dip on the other side. Lately I notice I wake up with pain in my back. I am TOTALLY DISAPPOINTED and will never recommend it again to anyone!!! You obviously get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: I Berk

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I was a tad worried about buying a mattress online. My biggest fear would be that this mattress would go soft (since it says it is a medium-hard mattress and some reviews said it had for them within weeks). However, I have had this mattress for 3 months and it is just as firm as it was when I bought it. It is too hard for others, but I purposely bought a firm mattress because I am nearly 300 lbs. The mattress also arrived quickly. After unrolling it, the mattress was full height within an hour (probably almost instantly, but I wasn't watching it that close). 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Firmness level sucks. Awaken in more pain than when you went to bed.
customer_reviews.text: Firm doesn’t even begin to describe this product. I had great luck with another brand bought through a wholesale club do I didn’t hesitate to jump on good deal for a vacuum packed mattresses . This brand is horrible. I’m not a small guy at 5’10” and 165lbs. I’m not the modern american hippopotamus either. I literally cannot sleep on this anymore. It causes extreme back pain. I wake up feeling worse than when I went to bed after spending 8 hours a day on my feet. My employer loves it though it insures I’d rather come to work than stay at home in bed curled up with my wife.
customer_reviews.author: jstarks

customer_reviews.title: Comfy mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the mattress and the company. We had a little issue once we got the mattress. When I put it on my daughter’s new bed I realize that the mattress was about 3 1/2 inches too short. I contacted the company and after quick back-and-forth they sent me a brand new mattress at no cost. I have slept on my daughters bed and absolutely loved it. Mattress feels very comfortable and she has not complained at all. Hopefully the quality will last
customer_reviews.author: Bugsy

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.....
customer_reviews.text: We've only been sleeping on it for a month so I can't speak to long term quality but so far it's been great. Slightly firmer than I'd expect from a plush mattress but not uncomfortably so. Beware of the unwrapping tho - it unrolls pretty violently. You definitely want to stand clear and follow the unwrapping instructions. We were nervous about buying a mattress like this but we are pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Castleman

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today, came right to my door in a rectangle box aboout 44lbs. Once I opened it and carefully cut off the plastic it just kind of popped into shape. I haven’t slept on it but after searching endlessly for a mattress that is actually Certi-PURus certified and not just claiming to be “green foam” it’s worth the price. You can definitely feel the springs if you push on it but they are covered. by foam and cushioning and so perfect for a kids bed that I’m not wanting to spend tons of money on.
customer_reviews.author: Sunita

customer_reviews.title: Look no further.  Best matress ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best matress I have ever owned. 100 times better than a $2000 matress I bought a couple years ago. Do not spend rediculous amounts of money on an expensive matress. Increased cost does not equal increased comfort. Easy to set up ( I did it by myself). Slept on it 24 hrs after I set it up. Extremely pleased. Can't praise this product enough. I'm a flight attendant and I have slept on thousands of matressss. This is the best yet. I'm not exaggerating !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Flamdoc

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We had previously purchased this mattress for our son 5 years ago, and were very pleased. So, when we needed a mattress for our daughter, we bought this one again. It's well made, very comfortable even for an adult. It's on the firm side, but it does have a little plush on the top. It's definitely a mattress I would buy again and recommend. Side note: it is an inner spring traditional mattress with foam around it, etc and it is heavy for a twin. It comes completely compressed in a box. This does not take away from the quality or comfort. In fact the last mattress we bought for our bed was also in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed with this mattress purchase. I previously purchased this same mattress brand and was very satisfied however I regret making this purchase. The mattress did not completely fill out and now has a bad indentation in the middle. Too much work to return please do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T.J

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be firm
customer_reviews.text: It is supposed to be firm but is like sleeping on a slab. I bought a 3" gel pad for the top, it now feels like sleeping on a padded slab.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good!
customer_reviews.text: First off, give this bed a week before deciding. The first week this bed was stupid stiff. It's been about 2 months and it's now perfect. Moving around still doesn't disturb the wife and it has gotten a bit less firm. That's not to say it's getting worse, I feel like it's finally found a spot to just say "Yo bruh, this is where I be chillin." Highly recommend this bed if you're on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fry

customer_reviews.title: Twin: 5 years & still great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these mattresses five years ago for my daughter and her roommate to use in their apartment. They have held up well and are still very comfortable. Anyone who has stayed or tried the mattress has agreed. The twin has also held up very well. On the other hand, my husband & I ordered the 10” king in the same brand & it was awful. Hard as a board & after two years still hasn’t “broken in” which we foolishly hoped for instead of returning. Just be aware, the positive review is for the 8” twin & may not apply to other sizes or thicknesses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ermatinger

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: We just got the mattress and buyer beware getting it out of the box is a major job! Once it is out unwrapping the plastic is easier and bed seems to have expanded as expected. My biggest complaint (take into consideration I have only had the bed a day) is that the warranty for this product is only a year. Most of the other beds I had looked at had at least 5 to 10 years. I hope it holds up but with no more confidence in the product by the manufacturer than a year I am rather discouraged.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Worst case scenario
customer_reviews.text: I too, was very skeptical that a mattress at this price point could actually deliver. However, after FOUR people in my family swore by it, I decided to bite the bullet and give it a shot. Worst case scenario, I figured I could always go the more expensive route if this didn't work out. I'm not disappointed one bit. I've had it for about 2 months now and I'm sleeping much better. It's a very firm mattress and I'm quite pleased. If something gives in the next few months, I shall return! However, so far so good :-).
customer_reviews.author: dawgpound

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box it's extremely firm but it softens a bit after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: At first this mattress was too firm for me, and I wanted a firm mattress. It felt like sleeping on a rock, but after a few weeks the mattress softened out a bit, and it became much more comfortable. I sleep decently on this mattress. It's much better than my old pillowtop which ended up getting very saggy and too soft. This is a good, firm mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnee

customer_reviews.title: VERY firm but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It was a little firmer than I thought it would be, but comfortable at the same time. I received it 5 days ago, so can't say how it will feel in a year from now. I can say it is the correct size for a king, it fit perfectly on our box spring we already had. It was easy to unroll and set up, and we were able to sleep on it the same night we received it. No fumes, chemicals, or bad smell coming from it, NO BED BUGS in it (I read several comments about that) and for the price and ease of it, I'll give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lv2sign804

customer_reviews.title: NOT for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress less than a year. Bought it May 2017. It is NOT for everyday use. Would work best for a guest room. I sleep on it every night and it has a low spot on the side where I sleep. My back hurts from it and now I am looking to purchase yet another mattress. Do yourself a favor and spend a bit more and get a better product. I could lose a few pounds but in no way too heavy for this bed.
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: We Made a Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about buying a mattress like this but after it came and my hubby set it up I'm so glad we did! It was needed for one of our children, and we didn't have hundreds of dollars to spend so this was the logical fit for our need and budget. After all is said and done, I'm well pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend this mattress to anyone. It's a fantastic purchase at a price you can wrap your head around.
customer_reviews.author: Palms Up

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased this mattress back in 2016, I had no issues with it. After a few months however, it began to sink in within the middle. I dealt with it up until now because I couldn’t afford a new one. Now that it’s 2019, it’s extremely uncomfortable and it feels like coils are poking me in my sleep. It also leaned to the left so much that I fell out of my bed when sleeping in 2018. I always have to push the mattress against the wall before sleeping. I was extremely unimpressed with this mattress and would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: octavia young

customer_reviews.title: 1 year strong
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for about a year now and I still love it. I love how it's reversible, that's one of the reasons I bought it. I wanted something that had springs, since I don't like memory foam due to lack of support. This mattress has the perfect mix. It's firm enough so that you don't sink in, yet it gives in all the right spots for support. It's seriously the best mattress I've ever slept on. I love how it doesn't transfer movement, as well. Even at almost a year, it still feels like the 1st night I slept on it. Definitely worth it, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: JES

customer_reviews.title: Still comfortable after 4 years!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these four years ago for our then 7 and 4 yr olds. We've moved them into new bedframes and new rooms since then and these mattresses have withstood it all. My husband and I joke that they're more comfortable than our bed! I actually came back to this product to purchase another for our 5 year old. It's great for light use or light users, such as kids. I could see it working fantastically in a cabin or a guest room as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Actually super comfy. We bought it for a trundle, and it was about an inch and a half too wide, but it was able to squeeze in. Considering getting a bigger one to replace my mattress
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I was pretty skeptical about getting a mattress in the mail. My parents were convinced I was going to end up with a terrible mattress. And secondly, I love sleeping on soft beds. However, after I opened it up I was a little bummed by the firmness of this mattress; I expected I wouldn't sleep as well on it. BUT the first night I slept on it I didn't move a muscle and slept through the whole night. That was four months ago and I've still be sleeping just fine, with no problems. Definitely worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: dezondra

customer_reviews.title: No more back pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have slept soundly on this mattress for a few weeks now and really love it. I had to rent a dolly from Home Depot to glide (well, ok - pull) it up stairs because it's quite heavy. That said, once I cut through the cardboard and then the plastic, it emerged like pop & fresh dough! Yes, there was a slight odor so I left it in the room with the window open to ventilate and haven't noticed an odor since. Thank you to all for leaving reviews. It influenced my purchase and I haven't been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby...
customer_reviews.text: It's "OK" for me. I broke my leg and spent way more time in the hospital than I should have. When in the hospital, I got used to the adjustable bed and thought it was the coolest thing. When I got home, my FLAT mattress and box spring set up was difficult to navigate. So I got an adjustable frame and this mattress. I like my old mattress, but it was not made for an adjustable bed. Use a stain cover. It stains EASILY. And it doesn't clean out well. Otherwise, it's comfortable, and suits my mobility needs.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T. Sr.

customer_reviews.title: So soft, in love
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress over 10 months now, and I admit to being on the fence about it. It took me a while to adjust to how soft it is - I seem to prefer firmer. But I enjoy it. It's so very comfortable and I sleep well. I fell in love with it when I got my son the twin sized version, and had to get one for myself. After using it for a while, I would absolutely recommend it. And it's double sided, which means it'll last a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the hidden charge  Recycle Fee $X $10.50
customer_reviews.text: There's a Recycle Fee $X $10.50 for it that may surprise you when looking at your credit card statement. This charge is not specified in the checking out process. No comment about the mattress quality, it's for my college going child, will update if she has something to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opening it was a fun experience that my son and wife both enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: Just received the product yesterday. Opening it was a fun experience that my son and wife both enjoyed. Bed expanded to 8" thickness in minutes with absolutely no smell what so ever, even my pregnant wifes enhanced nose couldn't smell anything. I was worried about the mattress being too short or narrow after reading some other reviews. My Ikea Brimnes bed fit it perfect. This bed is for my 2 year old son and he loves it. It is also super comfy for adults. Edge is less supported but that's to be expected, its a non issue. I will update this review if needed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Esenther

customer_reviews.title: Really great mattress, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great mattress, especially for the price. It has a perfect amount of firmness with the embedded coils and the memory foam on top provides softness and support for the contours of your body. As a side sleeper I’ve not had any pain in the shoulder/back as the mattress nicely cushions whichever side I sleep on. I’ve had great sleep for the past 10 months using this mattress. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Seven months in, ours already shows body indentations
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 10" king version in September 2018, and it arrived in early October. It was great at first, but it's already exhibiting body indentations just seven months later. I suppose with a killer price tag, the quality has to suffer. These mattresses received good reviews, so it's possible they were well made at some point. Regardless, I could not recommend this mattress based on my personal experiences.
customer_reviews.author: J Anthony Crumpton

customer_reviews.title: Just not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: Twin size. I have finally given this product nine months of use and this is what I have come up with. It is heavy and for its size too heavy. It is beyond firm. I had to put a 4" foam pad because of the pain induced on my hips and shoulders. While I still have problems with my hands going to sleep the pain has diminished, not entirely but diminished. I now believe that my hands get more sleep than the rest of my body. Understand this is one person's opinion, however, there are other mattresses out there that can satisfy people's needs with better construction and better results.
customer_reviews.author: fiddlefootn

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for price point - be sure to couple with mattress protector, mattress topper, and regular turning
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the twin size mattress in 2016. As both a side and back sleeper, this has been, by far, the most comfortable mattress I've used. So much so that when it came time to upgrade to a queen, I bought the same product in the larger size. I've used the bed on both slats and a box spring, and surprisingly, I preferred the slats. On top of reversing and turning the mattress regularly, I've found that using 1. a mattress protector and 2. a good mattress topper (3 inches good quality material) really helps preserve the shape and ultimately lifetime of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Another Alias

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: We are covert happy with this mattress. I was alone when it arrived and couldn't wait to open it. I suggest you have two people when opening it. It is very heavy and spring out of the bag quickly, not to mention he had to use my whole body strength to get it out of the box. We have been sleeping on it for a month and still happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked it but new concerns about other bad comments
customer_reviews.text: A decent one. I have tried this mattress in various sizes (queen, full, and twin). All of them I had good experience. I might purchase another one of these but just quite surprised to find out some bad comments about this product regarding beg bugs, dent, etc. I know that people experience differently about how comfortable this product feels. I think it is normal as people have different spine and muscle structures. For me, this one is fairly firm and soft at the same time. I liked it. Just worried to see the comments about smell and bed bugs... I did not have such problems before... well I will try, and if it doesn’t work, then I will return.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Firm Mattress, Low Cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my 4 yo, so I wasn't looking for something super lush, but this mattress is far more firm than I was expecting for a hybrid. It seems to be more spring and less cushion than I thought it would be. Transitioning from a crib mattress in a toddler bed, I think she'll be fine, but I would not order this mattress again. My 7 yo needs a new mattress soon, and I'll be continuing my search for something a little nicer. I got what I paid for, though, as it was fairly inexpensive, which is why I'm giving it four stars instead of three.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Mondu

customer_reviews.title: Spiffy little comfy mattress
customer_reviews.text: Just in time for holiday season, this perfect pop up mattress is just what is needed for an extra guest or a returning college student. Patience to unbox the tightly rolled mattress!!! Once unbox, have fun watching a comfortable soft mattress manifest from a smooshed plastic package blanket. Patience. The end product forms into a wonderful sleep. Recommend for guest rooms. This is the second time I purchased this mattress. I sleep on last years model with a down cover for extra padding after my son returned to college. It works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: gladysk

customer_reviews.title: Noone can believe this mattress came from a box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed while staying with a friend for a few months over the summer. My body can't do an air mattress and I needed real support, even for a relatively short stay. I have had 'bed in a box' mattresses before, but never this brand. I can say that this mattress is firm yet comfortable. Just as nice as any mattress I have owned. I installed it in the guest room of my friends house and there it remains, being used now as a guest bed by many satisfied folks.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress came in a box that was so unbelievably small (for a mattress) I was positive Amazon made a huge mistake. I took out this white columnar shaped item that was wrapped in a huge baggie-type plastic. No way this was a mattress. I dreaded having to return this mistake. In any case I took off the plastic & within a very short period of time, an entire twin mattress unfolded. Very impressive feat. Best of all, the user of this mattress thought it was firm enough & comfortable for good sleeping. The cost is ridiculous on top of all this. I found a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: RRJCRVT2912

product_meta.title: Signature Sleep Contour 8" Reversible Encased Coil Mattress, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style:8 InchSleep tight every night with our Signature Sleep Contour 8 inch reversible mattress. The core is made of independently encased coils, designed to eliminate motion disturbance and keep you sleeping soundly. We then covered these in a layer of foam to help distribute weight evenly and relieve pressure points from head to toe. This Signature Sleep mattress meets federal flammability standard 16 CFR 1633 and is shipped compressed, rolled and vacuum sealed for your convenience. Surround yourself with comfort and live the dream!
feature_bullets: A layer of high density foam at the top and bottom of the mattress gives you a comfortable embracing feel to minimize the feeling of the coils
7" 15 gauge independently encased coils provide an equal weight distribution by contouring the curves of your body, relieving pressure points
The reversible feature provides extra versatility enabling you to flip and rotate the mattress to even out the wear and last for years to come

Foam in this mattress is made without PBDEs, TDCPP or TCEP (“Tris”) flame retardants, ozone depleters, mercury, lead and heavy metals. Foam is low in VOC emissions for indoor air quality (less than 0.5 PPM). Made without phthalates regulated by the Consumer Safety Product Commission. Non-removable and non-washable cover.
Product dimensions: 80"L x 60"W x 8"H. Net weight: 74.5 lbs. Shipping dimensions: 63"L x 13"W x 13"H. Gross weight: 82 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars10,210 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
